content:
Certainly! Here is the rest of the revised 4-week workout program for the first month, with alternative exercises included for any exercises that are repeated more than 4 weeks in a row and with the pull-up alternatives included as requested, for a 4x per week program:

Week 2 (Continued):

Monday: Upper Body 1

* Incline Bench Press (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Row (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Push-ups (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Tricep Extension (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Concentration Curls (4 sets of 15 reps per arm)
* Lateral Raises (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Shoulder Press (4 sets of 15 reps)

Tuesday: Lower Body 1

* Deadlifts (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Leg Press (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Lunges (4 sets of 15 reps per leg)
* Calf Raises (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Single Leg Toe Touch Squats (4 sets of 15 reps per leg)
* Glute Bridges (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Clamshells (4 sets of 15 reps per side)

Thursday: Upper Body 2

* Bench Press (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Pull-ups (4 sets of 15 reps) (Alternative: Lat Pulldown)
* Shoulder Press (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Tricep Dips (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Bicep Curls (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Lateral Raises (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Push-ups (4 sets of 15 reps)

Friday: Lower Body 2

* Squats (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Leg Press (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Step-ups (4 sets of 15 reps per leg)
* Calf Raises (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Single Leg Toe Touch Squats (4 sets of 15 reps per leg)
* Glute Bridges (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Clamshells (4 sets of 15 reps per side)

Week 3:

Monday: Upper Body 1

* Incline Bench Press (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Row (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Push-ups (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Tricep Extension (4 sets of 15 reps)
* Concentration Curls (4 sets
